review: Everything went well except for the fact that I caught off guard when they told me they already collected the samples for a paps test without my consent. I would appreciate if they inform the patient about these things from next time. It should be understood that this is a matter of privacy.

My first delivery was done by dr hemalatha Devi, a gem of a person and super experienced doctor I would recommend her and people can blindly follow her for any gynic issues.she will not give unnecessary tablets. Even the hospital ambiance is also hygienic and neat. Before going there I consulted 3 other hospitals but this was the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excellent Hospital. Very intensive care. Treat patience like their own relatives. Dr. Swathi Apsani was very good discussing & explaining the upcoming condition of the baby. Hats off..!!!

I had dermoid cyst..I showed all my scanning reports in which it was clearly mentioned about my dermoid cyst.Mrs. hemalatha was still not sure that I have dermiod cyst she prescribed for ct scan which was about 6000 rupees. CT. Scan reports also reveled that I had dermoid cyst. Then Mrs.hemalatha said I need to undergo a surgery to remove that cyst she also said even my ovary will also be removed. She was very confident that without removal of ovary dermoid cyst could not be removed.Since I am planning for kids I was frightened by her words ..and consulted other doctor who just removed my cyst..leaving ovary intact..Mrs.Hemalatha might be experienced doctor ..but she did not updated her self with the latests medical techniques.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The wait time was lesser than most hospitals. Though I was taken to another doctor who collcted primary information, Dr. Hemalatha Devi spent sufficient time with me to explain the details. she was friendly as well.
Doctor not available but you given appointment, we wasted our time, without knowing doctor availability don’t do like this

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is not my first visit to doctor. The doctor and the hospital itself is very friendly and the atmosphere won't make you feel that you are in a hospital. I had my baby delivered at Parvathi Hospital. Not just me, my sister and two of my cousins were also delivered in the same hospital. I am now looking for my second baby to be delivered in same hands.

**** ** **** ** ********* ****** **** ** ****** Its was a wonderful experience of my journey. Dr Hemalatha well known Gynecologist/Obstetrician is as equal as my mother. Thanks team Parvathi hospital for your guidance & support.

Dr.C.Hemalatha Devi is very dedicated & has a magical hands and she understands all my concerns very well.I underwent laparoscopic hysterectomy. Thanks to the entire team, they took care very well, I am back to my routine life very quickly.
I'm very much satisfied hemalatha ma'am was so friendly and supportive. She guided me very well. I'm happy.
